name: MangaStream - Black
description:
Changes MangaStream.com to black background.  Applied to all pages except the forums.  Ads have been removed, but you shouldn't see them anyway if you have Adblock Plus installed.  Tested only with Firefox/Stylish.

Full size main page:
http://sadpanda.us/images/205779-NXQV6EO.png

Full size reading page:
